summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5597 for the improvement of Hudson Street, from Empire Way to 35th Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73676 as amended by Ordinance No. 73790, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
